head.title: Hope E. Worley Weds Curtis William Hillegas

hedline.hl1: Hope E. Worley Weds Curtis William Hillegas

block.p: Hope Elizabeth Worley and Curtis William Hillegas were married yesterday at the chapel of Princeton University by the Rev. Willard Wetzel, a minister of the United Church of Christ. The bride, 23 years old, is the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Robert W. Worley Jr. of Riverside, Conn. A graduate of the Westminster School and Lehigh University, she is an advertising assistant at the Alan Harry Pollack advertising agency in Metuchen, N.J. The bridegroom, 25, is a son of Mr. and Mrs. William J. Hillegas of Limerick, Pa. A graduate of Spring-Ford High School in Royersford, Pa. and Lehigh, he is studying for a Ph.D. in chemistry at Princeton.
